DO_SIMPLE: Do simple everyday. Enjoy your great results
NEW_ACCOUNT_TEXT: If you are, press button 'Create account'. If you are not - press button 'Back to login' and fill required rows with corrrect values
ACCOUNT_EXISTS: There already exists account with the same login
ACCOUNT_EXISTS_TEXT: Press 'Back to login' and fill correct password or come up with another login
FORBIDDEN_DELETE_PROJECT: Deleting the project is forbidden until it has tasks
DELETE_REGULAR_TASK: Do you want to delete this regular task and all progress?
HIDE_COMPLITED_TASK: Remove done task from the list
GO_OUT: Do you want to go out from app?
STAT: Your tasks and count of their accomplishments
